action-sheet.title: Action sheet
action-sheet.description: This element is a slide-up pane for presenting the user with a set of actions.

audio-bubble.title: Audio bubble
audio-bubble.description: This element handles the display and the play/pause functionality for an individual audio. This element uses the native embed audio element.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: This element is used to represent a CometChat.User of CometChat.group profile picture with fallback to the initials.

backdrop.title: Backdrop
backdrop.description: This element represents the background against which other elements are presented.

badge.title: Badge
badge.description: This element is a numeric value descriptor i.e it displays the unread count of messages for 1-1/group chats.

button-group.title: Button Group
button-group.description: This element is grouping of buttons together in a single line.

checkbox.title: Checkbox
checkbox.description: This element allow the user to select one or more items from a set.

cometchat-quick-view.title: QuickView
cometchat-quick-view.description: CometChat's Quick View component allows you to create a quick overview panel with a title, subtitle, and an optional close button. It extends from the LitElement's base class.

confirm-dialog.title: Confirm dialog
confirm-dialog.description: This element is a type of modal window that appears in front of app content to ask for a decision. It require users to explicitly confirm their choice before an option is committed.

date.title: Date
date.description: This element displays the date with the in-built support of 3 date patterns.

document-bubble.title: Document bubble
document-bubble.description: This element is a card view consisting of title, subtitle, url, icon and a launch button.

dropdown.title: Dropdown
dropdown.description: This element is a stylised version of the select component. It allows the user to select one option from a list.

emoji-keyboard.title: Emoji Keyboard
emoji-keyboard.description: This element is CometChat's very own emoji picker with native emoji support.

file-bubble.title: File bubble
file-bubble.description: This element handles the display and the download functionality for an individual file.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: This element displays an icon. It currently supports only svg icons

icon-button.title: Icon Button
icon-button.description: This element uses Icon element and Label element to show text and icon(with background) and along with an alignment property to align the icon around the text. The purpose of this element is to initiate an action.

image-bubble.title: Image bubble
image-bubble.description: This element handles the display for an individual image.

input.title: Input
input.description: This element allows users to enter or provide data or information within a web form or interface. It is one of the fundamental building blocks for user input and interaction on websites and web applications.

label.title: Label
label.description: This element provides descriptive information about the associated UI element.

list-item.title: List item
list-item.description: This element is used to display rows of information, such as a contact list, playlist, or menu. They contain Avatar, Status indicator, title, subtitle, tailView and menuView.

loader.title: Loader
loader.description: This element helps to notify users that loading is underway. They are used while retrieving data or performing slow computations.

media-recorder.title: Media Recorder
media-recorder.description: This element allows users to record voice and send them as audio  messages. It has a start button to start recording, a stop button to stop recording, a play button to play the recorded message, a submit button to submit the recorded message and a close button to close the media recorder.

message-input.title: Message Input
message-input.description: This element enable users to enter free-form text data along with  custom view of 3 variants (primary, secondary and auxiliary).

modal.title: Modal
modal.description: This element renders its children component in front of the backdrop element.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Elements is a set of pre-built UI components that act as building blocks of our UI Kit. These UI components are built following the web components standard and using lit library. This allows us to create a framework-agnostic solution so that they can be integrated with our web UIKits such as React, Angular and Vue.

pop-over.title: Popover
pop-over.description: This element displays additional content or options in a small, overlay-like window. It appears on top of the current screen without requiring the user to navigate to a different page or screen.

radio-button.title: Radio button
radio-button.description: This element allows the user to exactly select one item from a set.

receipt.title: Receipt
receipt.description: This element renders the read receipts such as sending, sent, delivered and error state indicator of a sent message.

search-input.title: Search Input
search-input.description: This element is built on top of Input element and enables users to enter a search string.

singleselect.title: SingleSelect
singleselect.description: The CometChatSingleSelect  component is a customizable Single Select component that allows you to choose one option from a list of box-structured options. It extends from the LitElement's base class.

status-indicator.title: Status Indicator
status-indicator.description: This element shows the user presence as dots with colored background and group type  as dots with background images.

text-bubble.title: Text bubble
text-bubble.description: This element handles the display for an individual text message.

text-input.title: Text Input
text-input.description: This element enable users to enter free-form text data along with  custom view of 3 variants (primary, secondary and auxiliary).

video-bubble.title: Video bubble
video-bubble.description: This element handles the display and the play/pause functionality for an individual video. This element uses the native embed video element.
